newsitem.title: UK: OPEC basket price fell to $17.34 on Thursday.
newsitem.headline: OPEC basket price fell to $17.34 on Thursday.

text.p: The price of OPEC's basket of seven crudes fell to $17.34 a barrel on Thursday from $17.52 on Wednesday, the OPEC news agency said, quoting the OPEC Secretariat.
The basket comprises Algeria's Saharan Blend, Indonesia's Minas, Nigeria's Bonny Light, Saudi Arabia's Arabian Light, Dubai of the UAE, Venezuela's Tia Juana and Mexico's Isthmus.
